title: Teena Sometimes
description: She’s sometimes a princess and sometimes a spy. Together with Ms. Habershaw, her laser cat, she kicks butt and takes names.
quote: I’m gonna sparkle you into next week.
altHero: Teena, a blonde princess in a jumpsuit, flying through the air
alt1: three ninjas with their pants chopped off to reveal colorful boxers
alt2: Ms. Habershaw and her laser eyes
alt3: Teena wearing a helmet and standing on the back of a unicorn
alt4: Teena dancing with a prince at a ball
